actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt tank truck hoses and couplings sold by dealers in industrial equipment and supplies from the manufacturers excise tax on truck parts.

summary.text: Provides for an exemption under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 of tank truck hoses and couplings sold by dealers in industrial equipment and supplies from the manufacturers excise tax on truck parts. Defines the terms used in this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt tank truck hoses and couplings sold by dealers in industrial equipment and supplies from the manufacturers excise tax on truck parts.
